# awesome-container



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                     | Description                       |
| ------------------------ | --------------------------------- |
| `--container-background` | Background of the inner container |
| `--container-padding`    | Padding of the inner container    |
| `--lg`                   | The view breakpoint for lg.       |
| `--md`                   | The view breakpoint for md.       |
| `--outer-lg`             | The outer view breakpoint of lg.  |
| `--outer-md`             | The outer view breakpoint of md.  |
| `--outer-sm`             | The outer view breakpoint of sm.  |
| `--outer-xl`             | The outer view breakpoint of xl.  |
| `--outer-xs`             | The outer view breakpoint of xs.  |
| `--outer-xxl`            | The outer view breakpoint of xxl. |
| `--sm`                   | The view breakpoint for sm.       |
| `--xl`                   | The view breakpoint for xl.       |
| `--xs`                   | The view breakpoint for xs.       |
| `--xxl`                  | The view breakpoint for xxl.      |
